description:
4-piston stopping power at your fingertips. If you have been noticing brake fade, like to carry a lot of gear, or want to upgrade to more stopping power, the Guide T are an affordable way to experience 4-piston brakes. The Guide T lever is paired with the world championship winning S4 caliper, a combo that will keep your velocity exactly where you want it.

  • S4 caliper is made from light and strong aluminum that dissipates heat quickly
  • Bleeding edge port makes brake bleeds easier
  • Matchmaker™ compatible clamp lets you clean up your cockpit
  • Ambidextrous lever mount
  • Comes with steel backed organic pads
  • Direct mount designed for 180mm rear rotor in the rear and a 200mm rotor up front
  • Hose length: front – 95cm, rear – 180cm
name: SRAM Guide T Hydraulic Disc Brake
